situated on both sides of the river
, where the south-flowing river takes a sharp northwestward turn.
Travel by train or bus from
. Busses from Oslo every hour, and twice every hour during rush hours. Kongsvinger is just an hour away from Gardermoen airport by bus.

value: directions=Follow signposts to Kongsvinger festning from downtown Kongsvinger
price=No charge and free admittance without guide, 650NOK for guided tours.

content=The fortress was by and large finished in 1684, even though some contruction work carried on for some more years. Situated on a hill north and west of the river Glomma, standing astride the ancient Vinger Royal Road between Christiania (Oslo) and Värmland in Sweden, the fortifications were constructed to protect against invation from the east. As Kongsvinger formed a junction point, with a north-south route along Glomma, and an east-west route between Christiania and Sweden, Kongsvinger fortress played an important role during the Napoleonic Wars, keeping the swedes at bay.
directions=Follow signposts to Kvinnemuseet from downtown Kongsvinger
price=50NOK for adults, students 30NOK and children below 16 years free admittance

content=The National Women's Museum i located in Øvrebyen just below Kongsvinger Fortress in a swiss-style villa from 1857. The museum is responsible for recording of women's life and workings in norwegian cultural history.
directions=Short drive towards Charlottenberg on RV2
content=One of Norway's most spectacular golf corse in silent pine forest.
content=Inland Hedmark is usually blessed with snow for cross-country skiing in winter. Some tracks also have snow cannons to make artificial snow.

content=An abundance of fresh water lakes makes Kongsvinger a great place for fishing. Among other species grayling, pike, trout, perch, ide, roach and burbot can be found in the surrounding lakes and streams.
content=Lakes around Kongsvinger also provide great opportunities for kayaking and canoeing. If you are not familiar with handling a canoe, instructions and training can also be arranged.
content=Besides bowling, Bowling 1 also has billiards and other games, and a bar with karaoke.
content=Indoor swimming facilities with sauna, therapy swimming pool, diving tower (1m, 3m and 5m), solarium and training studio.
content=Bunkers, trenches and houses formerly used by the norwegian military provide an excellent battlefield for paintball.
